alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 28 at 9:13PM CDT until May 28 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BEAVER...SOUTHEASTERN TEXAS...NORTHERN HANSFORD... NORTHEASTERN SHERMAN AND NORTHWESTERN OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 913 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Gruver, or 9 miles northwest of Spearman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Spearman, Hardesty, Waka and Farnsworth. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
